item.description:
For this month only, Boston Townhall will meet at our old place, M.J. O'Connor's. I must attend a forum for the Cambridge City Council candidates at the Ryles Jazz Club, 2nd Floor, 212 Hampshire Street, Cambridge. The Cambridge Republican City Committee is sponsoring the forum, and, of course, you are all invited.

Sorry for the change. We'll meet again at my place in December. Have fun at M.J.'s on the 1st! I'll miss seeing you all.

Lorene
item.name: The Boston Townhall November Meetup
